text: Aleksandr Leonidovich Bogatyryov (; born 6 March 1963 in Biysk; died 12 July 2009 in Biysk) was a Kazakhstani football player of Russian origin. ==Honours== ;Kairat *Kazakhstan Premier League champion: 1992 *Kazakhstan Cup winner: 1992 ==External links== * ==References== Category:1963 births Category:People from Biysk Category:2009 deaths Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Tom Tomsk players Category:FC Dynamo Barnaul players Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players Category:FC Kairat players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:Kazakhstani footballers Category:Kazakhstan international footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Kazakhstan Premier League players Category:Kazakhstani expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Association football forwards
title: Aleksandr Bogatyryov
